poem:
**Walls of Words**

In the coat of morning news,  
phrases sharp as barbed wire  
unfurl across the page.  
I sip my coffee,  
watch verbs transform  
into borders,  
adjectives march  
in uniformed lines,  
all while light spills  
through the window,  
inviting shadows  
to dance  
across the silent ground.
